# QUESTIONNAIRE BIG SIX (QB6) MEASURES
Big Six inventories of varying length were tested for comparative validity along with the BFI, the NEO-FFI, the HEXACO, and the IPIP measures in Thalmayer, Saucier, and Eigenhuis (2011; Psychological Assessment). The cross-cultural 30-QB6 includes the items that functioned the most consistently across 26 cultural settings (Thalmayer & Saucier, 2014).

## 30QB6 (A VARIANT OF THE 36QB6 CONSISTING OF BEST-PERFORMING ITEMS IN CROSS-NATIONAL MEASUREMENT INVARIANCE ANALYSES
Items suitable for administration
Scoring instructions and psychometric information, suitable for hand-scoring

## 48QB6
Items in a recommended format for administration
Scoring instructions and psychometric information, suitable for hand-scoring
